(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT This) (NN restaurant))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADJP (JJ closed)
        (SBAR
          (S
            (NP (EX There))
            (VP (VBP are)
              (NP
                (NP (CD two) (NNS kinds))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP
                    (NP (NNS people))
                    (SBAR
                      (WHADVP (WRB when))
                      (S
                        (NP (PRP it))
                        (VP (VBZ comes)
                          (PP (TO to)
                            (NP (NNP Wanton) (NNP Mee))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


det(restaurant-2, This-1)
nsubj(closed-4, restaurant-2)
cop(closed-4, is-3)
root(ROOT-0, closed-4)
expl(are-6, There-5)
ccomp(closed-4, are-6)
num(kinds-8, two-7)
nsubj(are-6, kinds-8)
prep(kinds-8, of-9)
pobj(of-9, people-10)
advmod(comes-13, when-11)
nsubj(comes-13, it-12)
rcmod(people-10, comes-13)
prep(comes-13, to-14)
nn(Mee-16, Wanton-15)
pobj(to-14, Mee-16)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (EX There))
    (VP (VBP are)
      (NP
        (NP (DT those))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WP who))
          (S
            (VP (VBP consider)
              (NP (DT the) (JJ whole) (NN dish))
              (PP (IN as)
                (NP (DT a) (NN package))))))))
    (, ,)))


expl(are-2, There-1)
root(ROOT-0, are-2)
nsubj(are-2, those-3)
nsubj(consider-5, who-4)
rcmod(those-3, consider-5)
det(dish-8, the-6)
amod(dish-8, whole-7)
dobj(consider-5, dish-8)
prep(consider-5, as-9)
det(package-11, a-10)
pobj(as-9, package-11)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (RB so) (DT a) (JJ good) (NN plate))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP (NNP Wanton) (NNP Mee))))
    (VP (VBZ means)
      (NP (DT the) (NN sauce)))
    (, ,)))


advmod(plate-4, so-1)
det(plate-4, a-2)
amod(plate-4, good-3)
nsubj(means-8, plate-4)
prep(plate-4, of-5)
nn(Mee-7, Wanton-6)
pobj(of-5, Mee-7)
root(ROOT-0, means-8)
det(sauce-10, the-9)
dobj(means-8, sauce-10)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT the))
    (VP (VBD charsiew))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(charsiew-2, the-1)
root(ROOT-0, charsiew-2)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT the) (NN wanton))
      (CC and)
      (NP (DT the) (NNS noodles)))
    (RB all)
    (VP (VBP have)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB be)
            (ADJP (JJ good))))))
    (. .)))


det(wanton-2, the-1)
nsubj(have-7, wanton-2)
cc(wanton-2, and-3)
det(noodles-5, the-4)
conj(wanton-2, noodles-5)
advmod(have-7, all-6)
root(ROOT-0, have-7)
aux(good-10, to-8)
cop(good-10, be-9)
xcomp(have-7, good-10)


(ROOT
  (S (RB Then)
    (NP (EX there))
    (VP (VBP are)
      (NP
        (NP (DT those))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WP who))
          (S
            (VP (VBP focus)
              (ADVP (RB just))
              (PP (RB solely) (IN on)
                (NP (DT the) (NNS noodles))))))))
    (. .)))


advmod(are-3, Then-1)
expl(are-3, there-2)
root(ROOT-0, are-3)
nsubj(are-3, those-4)
nsubj(focus-6, who-5)
rcmod(those-4, focus-6)
advmod(focus-6, just-7)
advmod(on-9, solely-8)
prep(focus-6, on-9)
det(noodles-11, the-10)
pobj(on-9, noodles-11)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD used)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB be)
            (NP (DT the) (JJ former))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(used-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, used-2)
aux(former-6, to-3)
cop(former-6, be-4)
det(former-6, the-5)
xcomp(used-2, former-6)


(ROOT
  (S
    (ADVP (RB Now))
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP am)
      (NP (DT both)))
    (. .)))


advmod(both-4, Now-1)
nsubj(both-4, I-2)
cop(both-4, am-3)
root(ROOT-0, both-4)
